title: PugSpotting: A True History of How Pugs Saved Civilization
description: Researched on three continents, PugSpotting lovingly explores the historical relationship between pugs and people. Learn how pugs have influenced the world - including the fields of art, literature, and even music. Learn how one pug changed the course of Western Civilization. Pug owners know how much they love their pugs...now you can find out how people have loved pugs throughout history.
author: Susanne McCaffery-Saville
